      • getAdminData

        public Admin getAdminData(java.lang.String adminMyID)
        getAdminData gets the record data for the admin recd id passed to it and returns an Admin object w the data
        Parameters:
        adminMyID - the admin's record ID
        Returns:
        admin object w/ all the data for that admin recd id

      • getAdminInfo

        public java.lang.String getAdminInfo(int adminID,
                                     Admin loggedInAdminUser)
        This method takes the admin to be edited record id and based on the role of the logged in admin user it creates a form pre-populated with the admin to be edited data
        Parameters:
        adminID - the admin's record ID
        loggedInAdminUser - admin user object from session (the person who logged in)
        Returns:
        admin object w/ all the data for that admin recd id

      • convertAdminRole

        public java.lang.String convertAdminRole(java.lang.String role)
        This method takes the role letter (like 'A') and converts it to human readable text (like "Super User")
        Parameters:
        role - the admin's role in the admin's record (S, A, V, etc)
        Returns:
        the admin's role as humn readable text (like "Super User")

      • updateAdminTable

        public void updateAdminTable(int adminRecordID,
                             java.lang.String fname,
                             java.lang.String lname,
                             java.lang.String adminMyID,
                             java.lang.String role,
                             int status)
        This method takes the admin's record id and the new info and updates the admin table
        Parameters:
        adminRecordID - the record id of the admin to update's record
        fname - admin's first name
        lname - admin's last name
        adminMyID - admin's MyID
        role - admin's role
        status - admin's status

      • inAdminUserTable

        public boolean inAdminUserTable(java.lang.String myID)
        This method takes the admin user's MyID and checks to see if the admin user is in the admin user table
        Parameters:
        myID - admin's MyID
        Returns:
        true if admin in table, false if admin not in table

      • createAddAdminForm

        public java.lang.String createAddAdminForm(Admin loggedInAdminUser)
        This method creates a blank form to add a new admin user
        Parameters:
        loggedInAdminUser - object
        Returns:
        a form for the admin to add another admin user

        lname - admin to add's last name

        adminStatus - admin to add's Status

      • inAdminTable

        public boolean inAdminTable(java.lang.String myID)
        This method will take the myID and check to see if this Admin user already exists in the admin table
        Parameters:
        myID - the admin to check's myID
        Returns:
        true if the admin is in the table, false if the admin is not in the table
